thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 103 of 1961
thread.title: Sunny

author: Sunny
title: Sunny
text:
Very good service! No need to ever visit a tyre garage again. Better pricing than tyre garages, selected for a two hour window and turned up an hour before and rang me to let me know they are running ahead of time and can visit me earlier.
Car was taken great care of and a full inspection of alloys, brakes and discs was carried out. Will use this company for all my tyre needs from now on.
